edge: New York pharmaceutical firm Wexel Hall funds the search for Blood Orchid.
Researcher Gordon Mitchell is a part of the team searching for the Blood Orchid.
Researcher Dr. Jack Byron is a part of the team searching for the Blood Orchid.
Researcher Sam Rogers is a part of the team searching for the Blood Orchid.
Researcher Gail Stern is a part of the team searching for the Blood Orchid.
Researcher Cole Burris is a part of the team searching for the Blood Orchid.
Researcher Dr. Ben Douglas is a part of the team searching for the Blood Orchid.
Guide Captain Bill Johnson accompanies the team searching for the Blood Orchid.
Partner of Captain Bill Johnson accompanies the team searching for the Blood Orchid.
The team searching for the Blood Orchid travels to the jungle in Borneo.
Gail falls into the water, is attacked by a crocodile and later rescued by Captain Bill Johnson.
The giant anaconda emerges from the water and swallows Ben. The rest of the team reaches the shore.
The team calls for John Livingston to join them but he is attacked and his boat is wrecked.
The orchids are a part of the food chain, and these snakes grow over unusually long lives.
Disemboweled anaconda with human legs hanging out of its abdomen is found near the orchids.
Jack realizes that orchids must be nearby.
Gail contends that the orchids may not work on humans.
Gail contends that the orchids may not work on humans.
The others rebel and start building an escape raft to leave the jungle.
Gordon discovers that Jack has hidden Livingston's radio and gun.
Jack paralyzes Gordon using a previously collected spider bite.
An anaconda swallows Gordon alive as she informs the others, who arrive as it finishes.
The now-psychopathic Jack fails to convince them to continue with the expedition, so they hack through the jungle to beat Jack to the orchids and retrieve their raft.
They fall into a cave trying to escape from an anaconda.
Cole gets lost and finds human skeletons.

A terrified Cole escapes from the cave, seconds ahead of the snake, which gets stuck in the hole. Sam beheads it with a machete, but another snake captures the hysterical Cole. The team finds him being constricted. Bill finds Tran's lost flashlight floating in bloody water. A terrified Cole escapes from the cave, seconds ahead of the snake, which gets stuck in the hole.
The orchids grow above a pit where male anacondas are mating with the female.
Jack forces the party to accompany him to the orchids.
Sam is forced to cross the pit via a thin log to fill a backpack with orchids.
The log cracks as Sam returns from filling the backpack with orchids.
Jack orders Sam to throw him the backpack filled with orchids.
As one of the anacondas tries to get Sam, she climbs out of the pit.
Gail tricks the snake into biting their fuel container.
Bill shoots it, but the gun is empty.
The anaconda bites their fuel container, which Gail tricked into doing.
An ensuing landslide buries the blood orchids due to the presence of the anaconda.
